attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to see the wonders of a man who only cares about himself.  However, after downloading it, the app possessed my phone! I am very disappointed with this turn of events as I just wanted to see a man complain about other people being treated equally! DO NOT download this app, it will give your phone a virus. What is that virus you may ask? Stupidity.
